caption.title: Research groups that contributed model ensembles to the downscaled GCM data used in this study.
caption.p: Climate model data were downloaded from the CMIP3 and CMIP5 downscaled climate and hydrology projections archive at https://gdo-dcp.ucllnl.org/downscaled_cmip_projections/. See methods section of the manuscript for details on the specific parameters used to access the data from these research groups.
Click here for additional data file.
